image(Image, int, int) - Static method in class simple.gui.DrawModule
Calls an Image object's Draw function using the stored Graphics2D object.
Image - Class in simple.gui
Object that works as an overhead for the BufferedImage object.
Image(int, int) - Constructor for class simple.gui.Image
Creates an empty image with a default filename of the given width and height.
Image(Image) - Constructor for class simple.gui.Image
Creates an image using the same filename and color data from another image.
Image(BufferedImage) - Constructor for class simple.gui.Image
Creates and image with a default filename using the color data from a BufferedImage.
Image(String) - Constructor for class simple.gui.Image
Creates a new image from a given filename.
Image(File) - Constructor for class simple.gui.Image

image - Variable in class simple.gui.ImageBox
Image object to draw.
imageBox - Variable in class simple.gui.Button
Image displayed on the button's background.
ImageBox - Class in simple.gui
 
ImageBox(Image) - Constructor for class simple.gui.ImageBox
Constructor which only takes an Image object.
ImageBox(int, int, Image) - Constructor for class simple.gui.ImageBox
This constructor is the same as ImageBox(Image image_), but it also sets the initial position.
ImageBox(int, int, int, int, Image) - Constructor for class simple.gui.ImageBox
Constructor which sets the imageBox's position and size, and then scales the Image object's size to match the size of the imageBox.
